meanings.definition: The ability to do something successfully or efficiently.
meanings.sent1: Her competency in math helped her ace the test.
meanings.sent2: The employee's competency in coding impressed the team.
meanings.sent3: His competency in cooking was so good, he could make a cake blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: Her competency in problem-solving was a shining beacon in the team.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's competency in rescuing people from burning buildings was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The legal capacity or qualifications required to perform a certain task or job.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer's competency in understanding complex legal matters was evident in court.
meanings.sent2: She lacked the competency needed to operate heavy machinery.
meanings.sent3: His competency in juggling tasks made him the office superhero!
meanings.sent4: The captain's competency in steering the ship through the storm saved the crew.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's competency in diagnosing rare diseases saved many lives.
